biotools.summary: Open-source project dedicated to providing a MATLAB framework for vibrational spectroscopy. The goal of the project is to provide a comprehensive and user-friendly environment for analysis, whilst facilitating development and validation of algorithms for computational biology using vibrational spectroscopy.

bioschemas.name: irootlab
